text: Donald Louis Mossi (January 11, 1929 – July 19, 2019) was an American major league pitcher from 1954 to 1965. He was a left-handed control pitcher. He played for the Cleveland Indians (1954–1958), Detroit Tigers (1959–1963), Chicago White Sox (1964) and for the Kansas City Athletics (1965). Mossi was born in St. Helena, California. Mossi died on July 19, 2019, in Nampa, Idaho at age 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Kansas City Athletics players Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Don Mossi
